trans-unit.source: Represents a single-row update operation expressed as a command tree.
trans-unit.target: 表示以命令樹表示的單一資料列更新作業。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> property is set, the command returns a reader; otherwise, it returns a scalar value indicating the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>屬性設定後，此命令會傳回讀取器，否則會傳回純量值，指出受影響的資料列數目。</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> ，指定用來判斷所應更新之目標集合成員的述詞。

trans-unit.source: The predicate can include only the following elements: a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> representing equality; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> that references the target; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 此述詞可以包含下列項目︰<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>代表是否相等。<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression>參考之目標;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> ，指定用來判斷所應更新之目標集合成員的述詞。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned, based on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref>指定要傳回的結果投影根據修改的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The returning projection includes only the following elements: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的投影包括下列項目︰ <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>;<xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned based, on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref>指定要傳回根據修改的資料列的結果投影。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> indicates that no results should be returned from this command.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>表示此命令應該不傳回任何結果。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得更新的清單定義更新作業的 set 子句。

trans-unit.source: The list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新的清單設定定義更新作業的子句。
